note:
Known from coast to coast like butter and toast
From headlines to bread lines
From schoolrooms to pool rooms
No other place in the contiguous United States
Or other environs of the world, welcome!

In the event I do something that prohibits those with disabilities, such as hard of hearing, vision, or other things, please inform me so I can be better about my own actions.

If you claim to be an anti-fascist but refuse to help those who fascism targets, such as the disabled, I don't want to be in your group.

:cc: Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

fields.value: A black and white drawing of my Raccoon Sona Kitkat in the pose from the first Garfield comic where Garfield is smoking a pipe. Instead of a pipe, it's a Mighty Plus Dry Herb Vape.

fields.value: A solid bright blue wallpaper from the Strong Bad Email "Virus" showing off the failure screen: "FLAGRANT SYSTEM ERROR, Computer Over. Virus = Very Yes."
